title: Pixel Watch, Pixel 7 and Google's Hardware Reveal 2022!
description: Google went ahead and went on a rampage of unveiling new hardware today at I/O. This is everything you need to know! That shirt!   0:00 Intro 1:00 Pixel 6A 3:28 Pixel Buds Pro 5:10 Pixel 7/7 Pro 6:43 The Pixel Watch 9:33 A Pixel Tablet 10:21 My Take  Tech I'm using right now:   Intro Track: Jordyn Edmonds  Playlist of MKBHD Intro music:   ~
transcript: - All right, what's up? MKBHD here, and today was Google's I/O, their annual developer conference. And usually we don't see a ton of hardware at events like this, but this one, for whatever reason, we got a ton of hardware, or at least hardware announcements. That's two things, and they're gonna be going on sale in the next month or so.
